attributes.additional_details: Families all over the UK are expected to pay massive rent top ups as the LHA does not cover their rent. LHA does not reflect the true rental costs in some areas. I've recently lost my job and I'm expected to pay £150pm out of my benefits towards my rent, Money the government gives us to survive on. If bedroom tax is being abolished because it against their human rights to pay, then surely this is against ours and we don't even have a spare room. Please help by giving your signature and help get families out of poverty.
